Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hôtel Val Girard in Paris (Gare Montparnasse - Porte de Versailles), you'll be convenient to Pasteur Museum and Eiffel Tower. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Arc de Triomphe.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 38 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Detached private bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

With a stay at Hôtel Val Girard in Paris (Gare Montparnasse - Porte de Versailles), you'll be convenient to Pasteur Museum and Eiffel Tower. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Arc de Triomphe.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Pasteur Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Georges Brassens Park - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Necker-Enfants Malades Hospital - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
UNESCO Headquarters - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Paris Expo Porte de Versailles - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Beaugrenelle - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Bourdelle Museum - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Place de Catalogne - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Stade de la Plaine - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Museum of Montparnasse - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Tour Montparnasse - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Pont de Bir-Hakeim - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Andre Citroen Park - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Pont de Grenelle - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Bobino - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 13 km / 8.1 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 26.9 km / 16.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hôtel Val Girard is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
